alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 25 at 9:30AM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting Greene, George and Jackson Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...The Flood Warning is now in effect until further notice... The Flood Warning continues for the Pascagoula At Merrill. * From Friday evening until further notice. * At 8:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 18.5 feet. * Flood stage is 22.0 feet. * Minor flooding is forecast. * Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Friday evening and will continue rising to 23.4 feet Tuesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. * Impact...At 18.5 feet, water covers roads at Smith`s Fish Camp in Southern George County. At 20.0 feet, water covers the main road at Plum Bluff in southern George County. At 22.0 feet, flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. At 23.5 feet, water is under homes in Plum Bluff Estates. Streets of Merrill flood. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
